cab.content: PAMPHRASE TELEGRM from the Governor General of New Zealand to the Secretary of State for the Colonies.(Received Colonial Office 9,49 a.m. -3rd September,19 1-'Clear the line.3rd September, With reference to your telegram of Augist 13th regarding Peace Treaty. By House of Representatives on September 2nd Resolution was passed that the House,of Represen-tatives in Parliament assembled resolves that this House assents to the ratification by His Majesty of the Treaty of Peace with Germany as approved by the Plenipotentiaries at the recent PeaceConference. Cn the same date the Legislative Council passed a s i milar resolution.LIVERPOOL.
